title: Hide-and-Seek
story: Hey, James. You want to play? Not right now, Elizabeth. Come on. It'll be fun. What do you want to play? How about playing tag? That's boring. Let's play hide-and-seek. Okay. Who goes first? I'll hide first.
summary: Two friends, James and Elizabeth, decide to play hide-and-seek but can't agree on the game. They finally settle on hide-and-seek and James volunteers to hide first.
image: Two children playing hide-and-seek in a park.
